it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6

Class Ip6Address

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6.Ip6Address
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IpAddress, Address
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ip6AddressPrefix, SolicitedNodeMulticastAddress

    public class Ip6Address
extends java.lang.Object
implements IpAddress
    Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) address.

    The host-id part of the address (the suffix) is not required to be all zeros; non-zero suffix is simply ignored.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Ip6Address ADDR_ALL_HOSTS_INTERFACE_MULTICAST
      All hosts on local interface
      static Ip6Address ADDR_ALL_HOSTS_LINK_MULTICAST
      All hosts on the local network segment
      static Ip6Address ADDR_ALL_ROUTERS_LINK_MULTICAST
      All routers on the local network segment
      static Ip6Address ADDR_MDNS_MULTICAST
      Multicast DNS
      static Ip6Address ADDR_UNSPECIFIED
      Unspecified address
